commit message: PlayerService: reset downloaded state when media file is absent

Storage: fix crash caused by ex thrown by isExternalStorageRemovable

crash happens at least on genymotion with Android 5.0.
/storage/emulated/legacy is listed in env variables, but API
functions throw exceptions when trying to pass the path as argument
adjust views elevation according to material design guidelines
search_list_element: fix plus button layout making it look square
adjust cards corner radius according to material design guidelines
setup margins for cards according to material design guideline

PodcastViewHolder: deellipsize description when disabling single line

Otherwise TextView glitches sometimes and show ellipsis even when
single line is set to false
episode_list_element: adjust divider line so it intersect another one
make space between cards equal on all Android versions
common_list: add padding in the beggining and in the end of list
episode_list_element: restrict title size for more consistent look
PlayerService: fix crashing on unregistering non-registered receiver

PlayerService: check PauseOnDisconnect every time audio becomes noisy

Need this to support switching of the preference during audio
playback

delete NEW_EPISODE_ACTION from DownloadReceiver

Instead just run UPDATE_QUEUE_ACTION after sync
Simultaneous work of UI, sync adapter and downloads makes system
lag sometimes
